description:
Ooga Kazuomi is http://anidb.net/ch79914 [Arata]`s classmate who is the class representative along with http://anidb.net/ch79913 [Chizuru]. He performs well academically, but has very poor athletic ability. He lacks social prowess when it comes to romance, with the help of Arata and their friends he realizes his feelings for http://anidb.net/ch81235 [Rena], claiming that he wants to be with her, and doesn`t want her to be with another guy.
His older brother was once a cheerful man who became a NEET due to heavy pressure and later is chosen to take part in the ReLife program as Project #005 by http://anidb.net/ch94724 [Arata Kaizaki].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ooga Kazuomi
